articles.title: Google fires engineer who protested at a company-sponsored Israeli tech conference - Engadget
articles.description: "I'm a Google software engineer and I refuse to build technology that powers genocide or surveillance!" The engineer shouted as such, interrupting a speech...
articles.content: Google has fired a Cloud engineer who interrupted Barak Regev, the managing director of its business in Israel, during a speech at an Israeli tech event in New York, according to CNBC. "I'm a Google … [+2615 chars]

articles.author: Tanaya Macheel
articles.title: Wolfe Research: Why recent rallies in bitcoin, gold may be related - CNBC
articles.description: The bitcoin rally was catalyzed by the new ETFs and next month's halving, but it's being carried along for other reasons, says Wolfe Research.

articles.author: Filip Lagaart
articles.title: US Dollar recovers a touch with traders letting the dust settle over March's Job Report - FXStreet
articles.description: The US Dollar (USD) is locking in its sixth consecutive day of losses with another leg lower. This time the catalyst behind the move comes from the US Jobs Report where, although the Nonfarm Payrolls number was an upbeat surprise, the chunky
articles.content:
• The US Dollar set to close off this week at a substantial loss. 
  • US Jobs report confirms uptick in unemployment and employers not willing to pay more for labor force.

articles.title: HelloFresh shares plunge 40% after earnings warning - BBC.com
articles.description: The meal-maker says it has changed its earnings forecast due to a "different operating environment".
